game.title: Retrieve the Ancient Scroll
game.objective: Retrieve an ancient scroll from the long-abandoned ruins of Eldrador.
game.description: The village elder has received a vision that the ancient scroll, hidden within the ruins of Eldrador, holds the secrets to a powerful magical ritual. However, the ruins are treacherous and filled with deadly traps and creatures.
game.reward: 1,000 gold pieces and the gratitude of the village elder

task.objective: Navigate through the entrance tunnel without triggering any traps.
task.description: The entrance tunnel is guarded by a pressure plate that will trigger a poison dart trap if stepped on. Find an alternative route to navigate through this section undetected.

task.objective: Defeat the pack of goblins occupying the central chamber.
task.description: The goblin pack is known to be vicious and aggressive. Use stealth and strategy to take them out without alerting any other creatures in the ruins.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the pedestal without triggering the magical wards.
task.description: The scroll is protected by a series of magical wards that will trigger if anyone attempts to take it. Find a way to disable or bypass these wards.
